quest.name: Explosive Profits
journal: Dob needs a womanman who knows herhis explosive ordnance.
objectives: Speak with the manic Hyuran man.
Use the Mark XLII grenades to destroy weathered crates.
Speak with the manic Hyuran man.
Use the Mark XLII grenades to destroy warmachina wreckage.
Speak with the manic Hyuran man.

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: You there, you seem capable. Experienced with weapons, are you? What about the explosive kind?

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: I've a friend who's uncovered a cache of imperial grenades, but neither of us has the slightest idea of how to use them. And you need to know your merchandise if you mean to get the best price.

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: My acquaintance is over at Specula Imperatoris right this moment, experimenting with the ordnance. I beg you, please go and give him a hand before he loses both of his...

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: My friend is still at Specula Imperatoris if you've a mind to look over those weapons for us. But pray make it quick─he can be a bit impetuous...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: An ordinary wooden crate.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Oh, hello there! Dob sent an expert to have a look at my grenades, did he? I was about to start lobbing them at those crates there, but it might be best if you showed me how it's done.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Says here on the case that these are the “Mark XLII” model...whatever that might mean. Naught for it but to try them out, eh? I'll wager you could blow up several crates at once if you threw one just right!

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Come on! Let's see how the grenades fare against those crates! We need an idea of how wide─and how potent─the blast is.

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: You found my friend, did you? All in one piece? Good, good. Show him how to use those grenades properly, and we'll try to keep it that way.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Rhalgr's righteous wrath, that was impressive! In fact, these imperial beauties might be powerful enough to blow a few other things to pieces...

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Come with me to the backside of the base─I have something else I want you to test the grenades on!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The immobile remains of a warmachina.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Do you see those warmachina? They're too broken for battle, but the individual pieces will fetch a decent purse on the right market. The only problem is, the things are still too damn sturdy to take apart without special tools.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Well, I'd say a grenade counts as a “special tool.” Here, have a new case─let's see some warmachina bits fly!

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: These Mark XLII grenades are pretty potent! Let's see if they do the job!

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Nicely done! Now I've learned proper grenade usage and we have a pile of parts to sell. Two birds with one explosion!

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Aye, both the weapons and the warmachina pieces should earn us a tidy sum...assuming we can find a discerning customer.

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I'd best take back any grenades you didn't throw. Where did you learn how to use imperial weaponry anyway?

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER02853
dialogue.text: Head back to Dob, and he'll reward you for sharing your expertise. Thanks again!

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: My friend stopped by and told me how the tests went, so I thank you for keeping him safe. I'm not entirely comfortable around imperial ordnance, to be honest...

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: We spent years slaving in a castrum workshop, loading powder into cannon shells and the like. It felt as if every bullet I filled was another countryman I helped kill.

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: The guilt grew so strong that I almost cast myself off a cliff. But my fear of death was the stronger─like a coward, I chose moldy heels of bread over the lives of my fellows.

dialogue.name: DOB
dialogue.text: In the end, I decided that I'd spite the Empire by living out my wretched life, and profit off the very same weapons I helped build. I'll be a damn weed, thriving on the rocky slopes of Gyr Abania...
